data.lyric:
[ti:Arcade]
[ar:Duncan Laurence]
[al:Arcade]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Arcade - Duncan Laurence
[00:04.48]Lyrics by：Duncan Laurence/Wouter Hardy/Joel Sjöö
[00:08.97]Composed by：Duncan Laurence/Wouter Hardy/Joel Sjöö
[00:13.45]A broken heart is all that's left
[00:18.71]I'm still fixing all the cracks
[00:23.49]Lost a couple of pieces when
[00:28.03]I carried it carried it carried it home
[00:33.61]I'm afraid of all I am
[00:38.29]My mind feels like a foreign land
[00:43.48]Silence ringing inside my head
[00:48.24]Please carry me carry me carry me home
[00:53.58]I've spent all of the love I saved
[00:57.23]We were always a losing game
[01:00.22]Small-town boy in a big arcade
[01:03.78]I got addicted to a losing game
[01:06.77]Oh-oh-oh-oh oh-oh-oh-oh
[01:12.84]All I know all I know
[01:16.92]Loving you is a losing game
[01:21.94]How many pennies in the slot
[01:26.74]Giving us up didn't take a lot
[01:31.92]I saw the end 'fore it begun
[01:36.37]Still I carried I carried I carry on
[01:41.90]Oh-oh-oh-oh oh-oh-oh-oh
[01:47.97]All I know all I know
[01:51.84]Loving you is a losing game
[01:55.24]Oh-oh-oh-oh oh-oh-oh-oh
[02:01.16]All I know all I know
[02:05.23]Loving you is a losing game
[02:09.41]I don't need your games game over
[02:15.90]Get me off this rollercoaster
[02:22.00]Oh-oh-oh-oh oh-oh-oh-oh
[02:27.77]All I know all I know
[02:31.86]Loving you is a losing game
[02:35.15]Oh-oh-oh-oh oh-oh-oh-oh
[02:41.22]All I know all I know
[02:45.24]Loving you is a losing game
data.trans:
[ti:Arcade]
[ar:Duncan Laurence]
[al:Arcade]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.48]//
[00:08.96]//
[00:13.45]仅剩一颗破碎的心
[00:18.71]我仍在抚平那伤痛
[00:23.49]当我将真心夺回时
[00:28.03]发现我的心已不再完整
[00:33.61]惧怕现在的我
[00:38.29]无法辨认自己
[00:43.48]寂静在我脑中叫唤
[00:48.24]请你带我回到家园
[00:53.58]我已付出所有的爱 内心枯竭一片
[00:57.23]我们注定输掉这场爱的游戏
[01:00.22]处于繁华闹市中的小镇男孩
[01:03.78]我深陷这段注定无果的感情
[01:06.77]//
[01:12.84]我所知道的是
[01:16.92]若爱上你 我会伤痕累累
[01:21.94]你是否真心爱我
[01:26.74]把我的心一层一层的剥开
[01:31.92]仅剩一副消极躯壳
[01:36.37]但我仍在探寻前路
[01:41.90]//
[01:47.97]我所知道的是
[01:51.84]若爱上你 我会伤痕累累
[01:55.24]//
[02:01.16]我所知道的是
[02:05.23]若爱上你 我会伤痕累累
[02:09.41]我不愿结束这爱情游戏
[02:15.90]让我逃离这个情感旋涡
[02:22.00]//
[02:27.77]我所知道的是
[02:31.86]若爱上你 我会伤痕累累
[02:35.15]//
[02:41.22]我所知道的是
[02:45.24]若爱上你 我会伤痕累累
